data.title: Frederick Warder
data.meta_description: Frederick Warder is a British actor who has worked as a suit puppeteer for Jim Henson's Creature Shop. data.text:
Frederick Warder is a British actor who has worked as a suit puppeteer for Jim Henson's Creature Shop. He was featured in several installments of The StoryTeller, playing the Half Man in "Fearnot", the title character in "The Heartless Giant" and both the Troll and the Trollop in "The True Bride." He also appeared in The NeverEnding Story III as Mr. Rockchewer, and had the opportunity to act outside of a suit as Calico Jerry, one of the pirates in Muppet Treasure Island.

Warder's film credits include the 1980 Flash Gordon, the James Bond entry The Living Daylights (as doomed agent 004), and Evita (with Madonna and Jonathan Pryce). TV credits, often as policemen, include appearances on the UK series Casualty, The Bill, Dalziel and Pascoe, and Doctors.

As a stage actor his credits include a 1976 UK touring production of Joseph And The Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat.

[]
